repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This appears to be an extremely unusual text. First verse on the folio x and 32v are almost same and the content also related but seems that x is misplaced or was part of different section of the same manuscript and the following folio are missing. After 65r one blank half broken palm leaf and then one broken leaf has some Sanskrit text written in Grantha script. But it is only incised and then again 1 blank folio followed by guard folio. Then at the end one more half broken folio with something in written in Grantha script. Documentation note before the front folio; Dattaputramīmāṃsā Dharma Somanātha Grantha pages 54 8 lines, 51

msItem.title: Dattaputramīmāṃsā
msItem.author: Somanātha
msItem.incipit:
x1 ṣyāparṇastataḥ . svayamapālanādeva prāpnuyāt svargamuttamamaṃ . anyathā vyabhicārī syāt paraputraparigrahāt . āsagotrasturna grāhyo x2 gṛhītaścet sau?vahidatti riyamavāpenātisantatirdāmureva hi jyeṣṭha…
x8 bhaginī bhāgineyaśca sapirḍo ayanahāyyapi etepyabhihitā na kaiścit pūrvobhāveparaḥ para iti putrabedāñcādaśavidhaputrā ucyante te
32v 1 oṃ somanāthakṛta dharmmaśāstravidyamānadattaputramīmāṃsāṃ sālikhyate granthāntaśeviyavā putrasvīkāraviṣaye svayambhupālanādeva prāpnuyāt svargamuttamaṃ anyathā 32v 2 vyabhicārī syāt paraputrapratigrahaṇāt . ayaśau mahadāpnoti narakaścaiva gacchati vidhavā ced anyaputraṃ gṛhītvā vā nayet patiṃ .. gṛheścet vidhavāputraṃ grā 32v 3 mañca pitrakānanaṃ ..
msItem.explicit: 65r 8 trā (gap of a syllable due to broken folio.) ścavaipatyāḥ tadabhāve paraḥ para iti yenya pravṛttau .

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin on the verso of the folio.

handNote.desc: Good. clusters are wide in shape.

additions.desc: On 32v in the left margin is mention of author’s name - somanāthīyya

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are given to separate words wherever possible.
